venue.name: The Alchemy Juice Bar & Growing Green Co-op

item.description:
350 International Day of Climate Action
For people around the globe fighting to stop climate change and to remake our world.
350: it signifies safe upper limit of co2 in our atmosphere. www.350.org

Saturday October 24
The Growing Green CoOp
203 New Britain Ave
10 am to 10 pm - all day and night festivities!

Event Schedule
10am - Tai Chi Demonstration with Eric
11am - Community Tree Planting led by Knox Parks
12pm - 350 Minutes of Drumming: *
Opening Circle - Drumming led by Craig Norton with Sound Healing by The Conduit & Crystal BioMat
1 pm - Yoga Demonstration with Bret Dubak of 700 Voices
Infrared Sauna Open (until 6 pm)
2pm - Kids Activities led by Sarah Andersen of CMD Youth
2:30 - 350.org Group Photo
3pm - Theatrical Presentation of the Flying Phlox by Virginia Lynn Anderson
4pm - Hula Hooping for all ages with Carol Becker of Fitness Hooping
5pm - Taoist Yoga Workshop with Christine - Elemental Yoga to Balance Earth Energy
6pm - Alchemy Caf√© Organic Community Dinner ~ $5 per person
7pm - Organic Art & Live Music Show featuring local artists & musicians


* At 12 noon, be a part of 350 Minutes of Drumming
with drumming/music Coordinator, Craig Norton.
Contact Craig at drumflight@sbcglobal.net to register.

<object width="425" height="349"><embed src="http://www.youtube.co... type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="349" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></embed></object>


Sponsors
Growing Green COOP
Knox Parks Foundation
Center for Serenity
InterReligious Eco-Justice Network
Playtivity
item.name: 350 Climate Action Day
